name: Devil, Infernal Tutor, Lesser
damage_resistances: cold; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silver weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Claws or Tutor's Batons or one Claw and two Tutor's Batons. It can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Claw (True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tutor's Baton
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Tutelage (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Speaks fiendish teachings. Each creature within 15 ft. and can hear it: 35 (10d6) psychic (DC 15 Cha half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 15) no material components: At will: bane calm emotions detect thoughts3/day ea: command enthrall suggestion1/day: compulsion

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Magically transforms into Small or Med Humanoid or back into its true fiendish form. Its stats except size are same in each form. Items worn/carried aren't transformed. Reverts on death.

reactions.name: Strength of Character
reactions.desc: On successful save responds with magic insult if source is creature within 60'. Creature: 7 (2d6) psychic disadvantage on next save vs. tutor's spell (DC 15 Wis negates both).

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede its darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Weaken Resolve
special_abilities.desc: Its speech has subtle enchantments that make it seem logical or profound regardless of words used. Has advantage on Cha (Deception and Persuasion) vs. Humanoids. If tutor spends 1+ min conversing with Humanoid creature has disadvantage on saves vs. tutor's Fiendish Indoctrination and enchantment spells tutor casts.
